abstract.p: US Power Squadron Cross County chapter will offer free eight-week water safety and basic sailing skills course at Mamaroneck (NY) High School (S)

block.p: The Cross County chapter of the United States Power Squadron, an organization of boat owners that promotes safe boating, will offer a free eight-week course on water safety and basic sailing skills beginning on Oct. 4 at 7:30 p.m. at Mamaroneck High School. Topics will include how to read buoys and charts, how to use a depth sounder and which safety devices to have on board. Course information is available from Virginia Moore at (914) 963-9409.

The Cross County chapter of the United States Power Squadron, an organization of boat owners that promotes safe boating, will offer a free eight-week course on water safety and basic sailing skills beginning on Oct. 4 at 7:30 p.m. at Mamaroneck High School. Topics will include how to read buoys and charts, how to use a depth sounder and which safety devices to have on board. Course information is available from Virginia Moore at (914) 963-9409.
